name: Cron Service
description: Monitors the cron scheduler and restarts it if inactive.
check_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then if systemctl is-active cron >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; elif command -v service >/dev/null; then if service cron status 2>/dev/null | grep -q running; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl restart cron || true; elif command -v service >/dev/null; then service cron restart || true; fi
verify_cmd: if systemctl is-active cron >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
